heading: r2-d2 towers over mit
subheading: fans transform the massachusetts institute of technology dome into an enormous version of the mischievous droid r2-d2.
author: reuters
text: massachusetts institute of technology students on monday turned the elite college's trademark dome into an oversized replica of the character r2-d2 from the  star wars movies.mit police discovered the dome covered in red, white, blue, and black mesh-fabric panels during a routine early morning patrol. the fabric panels on the mit dome were supposed to represent the character's sensors.the student pranksters left a dozen doughnuts and instructions for how to remove the installation. campus officials said that they would leave the prank in place until thursday morning.the college has a long history of pranks. previous mit stunts have included what appeared to be a police cruiser with flashing lights placed on top of the dome with a uniformed officer inside holding a toy gun.star wars, episode i: the phantom menace opens at us theaters this week.copyright
